text: Lo rani ngelehe i Huqe vin bete go tau lolo limegu, me nain wehi go, goin taqao vuine me nain tei utu na qatumu. Lo rani ngelehe nain bete na betui tangaloi vuro tau Balistaen lawe na manu lolo mahava me lawe na kankarue tau lolo songo! Me lolo ureure doluegi rain iloe huri vena lolo Israel a nora Huqe Mauri lure.
